medical_history.chief_complaint: Upper abdominal and back pain, with some substernal chest pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experiences upper abdominal and back pain along with substernal chest pain. She has a history of chronic pain associated with SLE and prior episodes of abdominal pain. Symptoms were not precipitated by fatty food. Duration and intensity of symptoms are not specified, and she has some nausea but no vomiting. No significant changes in symptom pattern were noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: SLE (Systemic Lupus Erythematosus), Raynaud's, migraine headaches, osteopenia, and prior laparoscopic bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy for ovarian cysts.
